title: GET RID OF MALE CHARACTERS PLEASE
body:
IM SO FUCKING TIRED OF THOSE FUCKING PENIS HOLDERS RUNNING AROUND LIKE THEY OWN THE PLACE. THE OTHER DAY A DARIUS KILLED ME WHILE I WAS PLAYING NAMI. SERIOUSLY?????? HOW LONG WILL U ALLOW THESE FUCKINGS MALES TO RUN AROUND BEATING WOMEN BECAUSE THEY THINK THEY ARE BETTER? ALSO ORIANNA IS SOOOOOOOOO SEXUALIZED. SHES PRACTICALLY NAKED. AND FOR WHAT? TO APPEASE THE MALE FANTASY? HUH? 
~~LETS COMPELETLY IGNORE THE FAC T THAT MOST MALES IN THIS GAME HAVE A SIX PACK~~ FUCK THESE PENIS HOLDING MISOGYNISTIC AMALGAM FUCKS.

I QUIT RIOT. U JUST LOST UR MOST DEDICATED PLAYER, I BOUGHT A 520 RP SKIN THE OTHER DAY GUESS THEIR GOES UR MONEY

replies.body: Should have not used full caps, would have made it funnier cause some people would believe you really thought that.

Speak for yourself I freebird helicopter whenever I pee.
I have no idea what that is but it made me laugh
I've genuinly had a post like this removed cuz "it was in the wrong boards".
That's because they (still) don't have the capacity to move posts...

>That's because they (still) don't have the capacity to move posts...

Chillax, they're being called the "Beta Boards" after all.

...Speaking of which, how long have they been Beta now? 4-5 years?
You have to avoid going full Poe's Law, people are stupid nowadays

God thank you i checked twice the section.

I totally agree

{{champion:79}} ?
the sexiest with best tits
If you're completely hammered, you might actually consider him sexy.

https://pm1.narvii.com/5762/292341d2ca02efc22cf024c81973ade05425642f_hq.jpg
holy shit I cannot stop laughing. Thank you... just thank you.
inb4 thread gets deleted
Please downvote this piece of crap because he is demonizing feminists and women. Report him for hate speech.

This is a parody of a feminist. 

Feminists demonize men, I can't demonize a feminist? Where is your gender equality now?

> [{quoted}](name=TheCodeisCupCake,realm=EUNE,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=XhBHgF5m,comment-id=000d0000,timestamp=2018-08-31T18:10:38.437+0000)
>
> This is a parody of a feminist. 
> 
> Feminists demonize men, I can't demonize a feminist? Where is your gender equality now?

Thieves steal from you so you steal from other thieves. Such is the equality you are pursuing. Your bigotry is no different from those called feminists by you.

You began your earlier post by calling me a 'piece of crap' and made me out to 'demonize' women. I am the bigot? If I hate women so much why do I have a girlfriend that, I joke not, is more dominant than me in the relationship at times. This is a parody. Get that stick out of your ass. 

And by the way some feminists do act like this, this is coming from meeting one in real life. They don't care about men, I agree women should be treated equal to men, not more, not less. Feminists these days just want endless privileges without having to work simply because they are women.

Moreover, you reject my opinion and then attack me, you are the bigot here. From what you have said so far, you appear to want equality between genders, so do I. How is it bigotry if we hold the same opinion?

Your painting feminists with a broad brush. The loudest and most representative feminists are too often the extreme ones "drinking mens tears". 

Demonizing people is just a cheap strawman. You can do better than that.

No... The fact that some feminist demonize men (the most obnoxious and outspoken of them), means there's cause to point out and criticize the people that do this. As stated, this is a parody. What is it parodying? Those feminist that demonize men. Not necessarily those feminist that don't. 

If the shoe don't fit, don't wear it. Simple.
just turn down all the graphics so you cant tell who is a male and who is a female ez clap

I have a random question.  Teemo is a male character but is his voice actor a female?

Same with old Nunu and Amumu. I have a feeling new Nunu is also voiced by a female. Bart Simpson's VA is a female as well.

It works for certain characters.

Females, total:	 ~~50~~ Inconclusive, based on new data.
Males, total: ~~92~~ Inconclusive, based on new data.
_Note: Counting Taric as both._

You should make a valid point of that means there's almost 2 men per woman. I know they can _technically_ handle it, but...

However, with your Darius/Nami example, and as a Nami main myself, this is with a heavy heart:
http://st.elohell.net/public/chill/e245453acaa9db363af849e4bc1db4dc.jpg

...Apparently, she IS edible (presumably, in more ways than one).

_Also, given this game's code, the use of cutlery is expected anyway. Though perhaps outright axing it is a bit excessive._
https://images-gmi-pmc.edge-generalmills.com/8890dc0a-ec93-4adf-b496-d6b264b56818.jpg

But Orianna? Seriously? I would refer to the full manual for proper usage, but the most important highlight is simple:
https://i.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/001/069/590/bd2.png

However, in the name of equality and all that, and from a male perspective, I have to point out it's not all fun, fun, fun, fun either:

>https://pbs.twimg.com/media/DkQRddpXcAA1-Bg.jpg

http://www.jagodibuja.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/07/338en.jpg

The whole gender thing is weird tho like, would you count {{champion:9}} as a man?  (I just googled how to identify a man or woman because I don't want to offend anyone, I was gonna just say 'he doesn't have a dick' but some people would be offended) Genders are decided SCIENTIFICALLY through which chromosomes you have (XY and XX, all that good stuff), does fiddlesticks even have chromosomes? He's a pile of sticks. Same with {{champion:136}} and {{champion:432}} and {{champion:53}}. Is it by their voices? Perhaps Aurelion is a female that sounds like a man.
I just have to say, perfectly timed my dude. While it may be players instead of characters, you predicted it mere hours in advanced.
I have no problem with this change, as it means there will be more female chests to appreciate.
